title: German-Russian Oil Pipeline going ahead, despite US and Polish ... - Reddit

readable_content:
Fargha131313 (2017-12-08): German-Russian Oil Pipeline going ahead, despite US and Polish protests
Russia
mysanantonio.com
The United States and some other German allies have bristled at the project, warning that it could give Moscow greater leverage over Western Europe.
- Because the U.S. wants leverage over Europe too. No wonder they are getting involved even though this has nothing to do with them.
